MFNRegion MFNRegionCreateHyperCube (int n, double R, MFErrorHandler e)

Function Documentation

MFNRegion MFNRegionCreateHyperCube (  int  n,
double  R,
MFErrorHandler  e
) 
 

Creates a cube in n-space centered at the origin with edges parallel to the coordinate axes and length 2*R.

Parameters:
n The dimension of the cube.
R Half of the edge length of the cube.
e A place to return errors.
Returns:
A new region.
